    • Method Detail

      • open

        public void open()
        Opens this ZoneTracker object and begin tracking services.

        Services which match the search criteria specified when this ZoneTracker object was created are now tracked by this ZoneTracker object.

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes this ZoneTracker object.

        This method should be called when this ZoneTracker object should end the tracking of services.

      • addingZone

        public boolean addingZone(Zone zone)
        A zone is being added to the Tracker object. This method is called before a zone which matched the search parameters of the Tracker object is added to it. This method must return true to be tracked for this zone object.
        Specified by:
        addingZone in interface ZoneTrackerCustomizer
        Parameters:
        zone - the zone being added to the Tracker object.
        Returns:
        true if the zone will be tracked, false if not.

      • addedZone

        public void addedZone(Zone zone)
        A zone tracked by the Tracker object has been added in the list. This method is called when a zone has been added in the managed list (after addingZone) and if the zone has not disappeared before during the callback.
        Specified by:
        addedZone in interface ZoneTrackerCustomizer
        Parameters:
        zone - the added zone

      • modifiedZone

        public void modifiedZone(Zone zone,
                String variableName,
                Object oldValue,
                Object newValue)
        Called when a zone tracked by the Tracker object has been modified. A tracked zone is considered modified according to tracker configuration.
        Specified by:
        modifiedZone in interface ZoneTrackerCustomizer
        Parameters:
        zone - the changed zone
        variableName - name of the variable that has changed
        oldValue - previous value of the property
        newValue - new value of the property

      • removedZone

        public void removedZone(Zone zone)
        A zone tracked by the Tracker object has been removed. This method is called after a zone is no longer being tracked by the Tracker object.
        Specified by:
        removedZone in interface ZoneTrackerCustomizer
        Parameters:
        zone - the removed zone.
